/* estilos solo para mobile */
.mobile-version .board-coyuntura-maquillada-mobile {
  background: #f4f4f4;
  padding-top: 28px;
  margin: 0;
  position: relative;
}

.mobile-version .board-coyuntura-maquillada-mobile:before {
  content: "";
  width: 220px;
  height: 90px;
  background: url(../img/logo-el-nuevo-tiempo.png) 0px 0px/cover no-repeat;
  display: block;
  margin: 0px auto 8px;
}

.mobile-version .board-coyuntura-maquillada-mobile .board-coyuntura-maquillada-content .main-article-container article {
  border-bottom-color: #d5d5d5;
}

/* colores para textos mobile y desktop */
.board-coyuntura-maquillada-mobile .board-coyuntura-maquillada-content .main-article-container article .info .category-published .page-link {
  color: #0090df;
}

.board-coyuntura-maquillada-mobile .board-coyuntura-maquillada-content .main-article-container article .info .category-published .published-at {
  color: #464545;
}

.board-coyuntura-maquillada-mobile .board-coyuntura-maquillada-content .main-article-container article .info .titulo .page-link {
  color: #2d4154;
}

.board-coyuntura-maquillada-mobile .board-coyuntura-maquillada-content .main-article-container article .info .titulo .page-link:hover {
  color: #464545;
}

.board-coyuntura-maquillada-mobile .board-coyuntura-maquillada-content .main-article-container article .info .epigraph-container .page-link {
  color: #1b1b1b;
}

.board-coyuntura-maquillada-mobile .board-coyuntura-maquillada-content .articles-container .slider article .category-published .page-link {
  color: #0090df;
}

.board-coyuntura-maquillada-mobile .board-coyuntura-maquillada-content .articles-container .slider article .category-published .published-at {
  color: #464545;
}

.board-coyuntura-maquillada-mobile .board-coyuntura-maquillada-content .articles-container .slider article .title-container .page-link {
  color: #2d4154;
}

/* estilos solo para desktop */
@media (min-width: 768px) {
  .board-coyuntura-maquillada {
    background-color: #f4f4f4;
  }
  .board-coyuntura-maquillada .content_grid_margin {
    padding: 0;
    position: relative;
  }
  .board-coyuntura-maquillada .content_grid_margin .module-free-html:first-of-type {
    padding-top: 162px;
  }
  .board-coyuntura-maquillada .content_grid_margin::before {
    content: "";
    width: 210px;
    height: 90px;
    position: absolute;
    top: 39px;
    left: 0;
    background: url("../img/logo-el-nuevo-tiempo.png") 0 0/cover no-repeat;
  }
  .board-coyuntura-maquillada .content_grid_margin .board-coyuntura-maquillada-content .main-article-container {
    border-bottom-color: #d5d5d5;
  }
  .board-coyuntura-maquillada .content_grid_margin .board-coyuntura-maquillada-content .articles-container .slider {
    border: 0;
    padding-top: 24px;
  }
}
